description:
"The Divine Fist of the North Star saves people. You should forget about revenge."
When Yu-Ling tells Fei-He Fei-Yan`s last words, she doesn`t know what to do with herself. Meanwhile, Kenshiro is doing his best to find Erika and Yasaka.
Erika has been taken to an underground palace, where`s she told the truth about "Migadol`s Thunderbolts" by the leaders of Genesis. What are the Thunderbolts of Migadol that are in her memories, and who was her father, the genius scholar Robert Arendt...?!
In order to save Yasaka`s life, Erika eventually makes her decision.
Source: crunchyroll
